meanings.definition: A form of reproduction in plants where the embryo develops from a cell other than the egg cell.
meanings.sent1: The apospory of the plant amazed the scientists studying its growth.
meanings.sent2: Apospory is a unique method of plant reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The apospory of the plant made it a star in the botanical world.
meanings.sent4: The apospory of the plant was like a secret code for its survival.
meanings.sent5: The apospory of the plant was a fascinating topic in biology class.

meanings.definition: The process of a plant reproducing through asexual means without the formation of seeds.
meanings.sent1: The apospory of the fern allowed it to spread rapidly.
meanings.sent2: Apospory is a common method of reproduction in certain plants.
meanings.sent3: The apospory of the plant was like a magic trick in nature.
meanings.sent4: The apospory of the plant was a silent revolution in botany.
meanings.sent5: The apospory of the plant was a key to its survival in harsh conditions.
